short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickTab - Your all-in-one CS50x new tab experience. Search, plan, and access your favorite CS50x tools effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CS50x QuickTab is a browser extension designed to enhance your experience while taking Harvard's CS50x course. This extension provides you with quick access to essential tools and resources for the course right from your browser's new tab page. Whether you're searching for relevant course materials or simply customizing the interface, the CS50x QuickTab has you covered.
